definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be agitated, quiver, quake, be excited, perturbed (Ph. Iph. (+ Inf. abs. Qal) disquiet, disturb, Inscr. Tabn.:4, 6, 7; NH Hiph. provoke to wrath; rjz, tremble (with rage, fear, Dozy); V, VIII, rumble (of thunder, Frey), rajazun a trembling disease (of camels), etc.; Aram. [[רְגַו]] tremble, rage, rgaz be enraged; Zinj. [[רגז]] wrath, Lzb 367);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְרָגַז]] Pr 29:9, 3 fs. [[רָֽגְזָה]] Is 14:9 +, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִרְגַּו]] 2Sa 7:10, 1Ch 17:9, 2 fs.[[וַתִּרְגְּוִי]] Ez Eze 16:43 (but v. infr.); 3 mp!. [[יִרְגְּזוּן]] Hb Hab 3:7, [[יִרְגָּז֑וּן]] Ex 15:14, etc.; Imv. ms. [[רְגָ֫וָה]] (Ges:§ 48 i) Is 32:1l, mpl. [[רִהְזוּ]] Ps 4:5;—quake, subj. [[אֶרֶץ]] 1Sa 14:15, Am 8:8 ([[עַל]] rei), Ps 77:19 (+ [[רָעַשׁ]]), Jn 2:10 ([[לִפְנֵי]] of locusts; ‖[[רלשׁ ]]), Pr 30:21([[תַּחַת]] pers.); subj. [[מוֹסְדֵי הָרִים]] Ps 18:8 (‖[[רלשׁ ]]), = 2Sa 22:8 ([[מוֹסְדוֹת הַשָׁמַיִם]]; ‖ id.); [[הֶהָרִים]] Is 5:25; [[תְּהׂמוֹת]] Ps 77:17; of tent-curtains Hb Hab 3:7 (fig. of terror of tent-dwellers); of people, in dread, c. [[מִפְּנֵי]] pers. De 2:25 (‖[[תוּל ]]), Is 64:1; c. [[עַל]] rei Je 33:9 (+ [[פָּחַד]]); abs., Ex 15:14 (‖ ´[[חִיל אָחַז וגו]]:), Ps 99:1, Jn 2:l; pregn. = come quivering Mic 7:17 ([[מִן]] loc.); of pers., in fear, awe, Ge 45:24 ([[ב]] loc.), Is 32:11 (‖[[הָרַד ]]), v:Is 32:10, Ps 4:5, Hb Hab 3:16 ([[תַּחְתַּי]]), cf. of [[בִּטְבִי]] Hb Hab 3:16; of Israel, = be disquieted, 2Sa 7:10 = 1Ch 17:9; be excited, perturbed, of pers. 2 S 2Sa 19:1 (by grief; cf. Dr), [[שְׁאוֹל]] Is 14:9 (surprise ; [[ל]] pers.); in rage, c. [[ל]], at, Ez Eze 16:43 (of Jerus. personif.; but rd.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִרְגִּיז]] Is 23:11; 2 ms. sf. [[הִרְגַּוְחַנִי]] 1Sa 28:15; Impf. 1 S.[[ארְגִּיו]] Is 13:13; Inf. cstr. [[הִרְגִּיו]] (Ges:§ 53 l) Je 50:34; Pt. [[מִרְגִּיז]] Is 14:16, Job 9:6, pl. cstr. [[מַרְגִּיוֵי]] Job 12:6;—cause to quake, disquiet, enrage: cause earth to quake Is 14:16 (fig.; ‖[[רעשׁ ]]), Job 9:6 shake earth [[מִמְּקוֹמָתּ]]; heavens Is 13:13 (‖[[רעשׁ ]]); kingdoms Is 23:11; cause disquiet, c. [[ל]] pers., Je 50:34 (‖[[רגע ]]); = disturb 1Sa 28:15 (cf. Ph. [[תרגזן]], Inscr. Tabn.:4 Dr:sm xxviii);= enrage, provoke, [[מַרְגִּיוֵי אֵל]] Job 12:6; so also prob. Ez Eze 16:43 (rdg. [[תַּרְגִּוִי לִי]]), v.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: excite oneself, only Inf.cstr. sf. [[אלי הִתְרַגֶּוְךָ]] thine exciting thyself (to rage) against me, 2Ki 19:27, 2Ki 19:26 = Is 37:28, Is 37:29.
